title: B.W.D.
brief_description: Bacillary White Diarrhoea causes an annual loss to the British poultry industry of millions of pounds. The disease can be controlled by careful precautions, including blood-testing of stock and scrupulous attention to hygiene at all stages. This film explains the precautions necessary and gives details of the United Kingdom Ministry of Agriculture’s scheme to combat the disease.
